items.title: freeCodeCamp
items.description: I started my developer journey at freeCodeCamp.org when I was 14 and didn't speak English. I've been learning ever since.

items.title: Python Bootcamp
items.description: I learned Python as my first programming language, as it's considered a beginner-friendly language that makes it easier to understand fundamental programming concepts.

items.title: Web Development Bootcamp
items.description: I really mastered my web development skills with this boot camp. I learned React, Node.js, Express, how databases work and more.

items.title: High Shcool graduation
items.description: With a focus on my developer journey, I made the decision to drop out of high school 3 years prior to graduation and graduate early, taking the GED test, allowing me to earn my High School Equivalency Credential.

items.title: Ethereum Developer Bootcamp
items.description: I am currently enrolled in this alchemy university bootcamp, which teaches you the fundamentals of blockchain technologies and how to build decentralized applications on the Ethereum blockchain.

items.title: Freelancing
items.description: I made automations using Python for example Twitter, Twitch, and Discord bots. I attached one of the major bots I made, it tweets the "crypto fear and greed index" and the average funding rate across all major crypto exchanges.

items.title: Moonlanding Media
items.description: At Moonlanding Media I was hired to build out a dashboard to manage therir twitter accounts.

items.title: Whaleportal
items.description: Crypto YouTuber (@TheBlockchainToday) for whom I built a Twitter bot, asked me if I would like to build out his project. He explained the idea he had, and I built Whaleportal from an idea as you see it today.

items.title: Walletportal
items.description: This is a personal project of mine, you can track your crypto portfolio and synchronize across devices if you log in with Google.

items.title: Dister
items.description: Dister is a decentralized freelance platform that allows you to hire freelancers and get paid in crypto. I'm currently working on the frontend of the project and learning web3 development in the process.
